MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA11 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Broad Lane, Troutbeck Grove and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by an underground cable fault which has caused fuses to blow at the local substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:35 AM on 13th November 2020.
